services.title: Inception & Feasibility
services.summary: Budget estimates, cost plans, and cash flow forecasts during project inception and feasibility stages.

detailSections.heading: What we do
detailSections.content: We provide comprehensive cost planning and feasibility analysis from the earliest stages of your project, ensuring informed decision-making and budget control.

detailSections.heading: Deliverables
detailSections.content: Budget estimates, detailed cost plans, cash flow projections, and feasibility reports.

detailSections.heading: Who it helps
detailSections.content: Project owners, developers, and funding agencies requiring early-stage cost certainty.

services.title: Pre-Contract Cost Control
services.summary: Cost planning, estimates, and budget control during design stages.
bullets: Periodic reports and cash flow forecasts

detailSections.heading: What we do
detailSections.content: We monitor and control costs throughout the design phase, providing regular updates and recommendations to keep your project on budget.

detailSections.heading: Deliverables
detailSections.content: Cost plans, periodic cost reports, cash flow forecasts, and value engineering recommendations.

detailSections.heading: Who it helps
detailSections.content: Architects, engineers, and project owners managing design-stage budgets.

services.title: Tender & Contract Documentation
services.summary: Preparation of bills of quantities, tender documents, and contract administration.

detailSections.heading: What we do
detailSections.content: We prepare comprehensive tender documentation including detailed bills of quantities, contract terms, and all supporting documentation required for procurement.

detailSections.heading: Deliverables
detailSections.content: Bills of quantities, tender documents, contract agreements, insurance schedules, and performance bonds.

detailSections.heading: Who it helps
detailSections.content: Project owners, government agencies, and organizations requiring professional procurement documentation.

services.title: Tender Selection & Appraisal
services.summary: Evaluation and shortlisting of tenders with detailed appraisal reports.

detailSections.heading: What we do
detailSections.content: We conduct thorough evaluation of submitted tenders, providing detailed analysis and recommendations for contractor selection.

detailSections.heading: Deliverables
detailSections.content: Tender evaluation reports, shortlisting recommendations, comparative analysis, and selection justifications.

detailSections.heading: Who it helps
detailSections.content: Procurement departments, project managers, and decision-makers requiring objective tender assessment.

services.title: Interim Valuations
services.summary: Monthly valuations and payment certifications during construction.

detailSections.heading: What we do
detailSections.content: We provide accurate monthly valuations and payment certifications based on work completed, ensuring fair and timely payments.

detailSections.heading: Deliverables
detailSections.content: Monthly valuation reports, payment certificates, progress assessments, and variation valuations.

detailSections.heading: Who it helps
detailSections.content: Contractors, project owners, and financial institutions managing construction payments.

services.title: Post-Contract Cost Control
services.summary: Cost monitoring, variation management, and financial reporting during construction.

detailSections.heading: What we do
detailSections.content: We monitor project costs throughout construction, managing variations and providing regular financial reports to keep stakeholders informed.

detailSections.heading: Deliverables
detailSections.content: Cost reports, variation valuations, cost forecasts, and financial summaries.

detailSections.heading: Who it helps
detailSections.content: Project managers, owners, and funders requiring ongoing cost visibility and control.

services.title: Final Account
services.summary: Preparation and agreement of final accounts upon project completion.

detailSections.heading: What we do
detailSections.content: We prepare comprehensive final accounts, reconciling all variations and certifying final payments upon project completion.

detailSections.heading: Deliverables
detailSections.content: Final account statements, variation reconciliations, final payment certificates, and account agreements.

detailSections.heading: Who it helps
detailSections.content: All parties requiring closure of project financial matters.

services.title: Dispute / Claims Support
services.summary: Alternative dispute resolution, claims preparation, and litigation support.

detailSections.heading: What we do
detailSections.content: We provide expert support for construction disputes, including ADR facilitation, claims preparation, and litigation support services.

detailSections.heading: Deliverables
detailSections.content: Claims reports, expert witness statements, ADR documentation, and litigation support materials.

detailSections.heading: Who it helps
detailSections.content: Parties involved in construction disputes requiring expert quantity surveying support.

projects.title: Proposed Development of Morogoro Central Market
projects.summary: Quantity surveying services from inception to final account for the development of Morogoro Central Market.

teamMembers.bio: Experienced in pre and post contract duties, project management and contract administration.

certificates.title: AQRB Practising Certificate
certificates.issuer: Architects and Quantity Surveyors Registration Board (AQRB)

seoSettings.defaultTitle: KJ & Associates Consultancy Ltd | Quantity Surveyors & Construction Project Managers
seoSettings.defaultDescription: Professional quantity surveying and construction project management services in Tanzania. 17+ years experience serving public, private, and donor-funded projects.
